job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: Job SummarybrbrstrongOverview  Group and DepartmentbrbrstrongDisney Media amp Entertainment Distribution DMED Technology creates products platforms and innovations for the DMED Segment and the Walt Disney Company by driving the strategic development and use of technology building scalable systems and products to empower our businesses and engage consumers Within DMED Technology this team lives in the Consumer Experiences amp Platforms pillar which includes both product and engineering teams to develop create enhance and grow the DMED Technology digital product portfoliobrbrThis team runs Personalization and Recommendations for DMED Technology digital products consisting of a wide variety of content across a worldclass portfolio with immense scale You could have a direct impact on personalization growth and commercialization across brands including ESPN Marvel ABC Freeform National Geographic and more accounting for hundreds of millions of consumers each year If you want to have a hand in enhancing machine learning capabilities and artificial intelligence behind one of the best and most loved companies this role may be for you In an age where our consumers are online and seeking the right content at the right time come be a part of the team behind the magic delivering on that promisebrbrstrongJob SummarybrbrstrongThe Data Scientist will work in our dynamic interdisciplinary team of data scientists data engineers and software engineers They will have opportunities to work on tasks in any of these disciplines insofar as they are qualified but will be focused primarily on data science related tasks feature engineering model building model validation etcbrbrThe Data Scientist is a critical position within DMED Technology who specializes in applying statistical methods to meet optimization personalization recommendations and efficiency related challenges in close collaboration with engineering and business partners You will be primarily focused on delivering value by developing algorithms that drive integral underlying functionality of our various entertainment services In addition throughout the algorithm development process you will perform thorough data analyses and present these findings to stakeholders across the organization to deliver insights about our products and our customers Collaboration is key to success at Disney and you are expected to build bridges and maintain communication across various teams throughout any given project so strong communication skills are a mustbrbrResponsibilitiesbrbrstrongResponsibilities may include but not limited tobrbrstrongulliPerforming innovative research on content delivery optimizationliliTranslating business problems into an actionable data science projectliliPresenting analyses and models in a clear easy to understand mannerliliDeveloping deploying and supporting MLAI modelsliliBuilding reports and realtime dashboards for our stakeholdersliliDeveloping statistical experiments and analyzing the resultsliliProcess cleanse and verify the integrity of data liliParticipating in data validation effortsliliData discovery and exploration tasksbrbrliulstrongBasic QualificationsbrbrstrongstronguBasic QualificationsbrbrustrongulliMasters degree in a quantitative discipline statistics data science mathematics economics etclili3 years of work experience in data science statistics or predictive analytics liliDeep knowledge of statistical principles and the underlying data assumptions on which they relylili1 year handson experience with at least 2 of the following recommendation systems deep learning reinforcement learning churn modeling subscriber growth modeling clusteringsegmentation etcliliUnderstanding of software development lifecycle liliExperience working with Python and other data science toolsliliThe ability to effectively communicate technical ideas to both technical and nontechnical audiencesliliFamiliarity with databases and data retrieval including SQL liliHandson experience with AWS or other similar cloud servicesliliA passion for data and technologybrbrliulPreferred QualificationsbrbrstronguPreferred QualificationsbrbrustrongulliPrevious experience in entertainmentliliKnowledge of the video streaming industryliliDemonstrated delivery of machine learning techniques in realtime applicationsbrbrliul846221BR
